text.div:
CareTeamStatus

Indicates whether the team is current , represents future intentions or is now a historical record.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include all codes defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/CodeSystem/careteam-status

name: CareTeamStatus
description: Indicates whether the team is current , represents future intentions or is now a historical record.
